title: Sooo uhh... where are the Swain nerfs?
body:
Not like he has almost a 60% win rate and is banned in half of all games or anything.

I know that buffing Xin slightly and giving Corki new cooldowns must be of far far greater importance to you than dealing with the bird-man-menace ruining everyone's ranked games. But why Swain escaped the patch notes completely... bewilders me.

replies.body: People know how to counter swain in high elo. In low elo, swain is god tier basically because no one knows how to counter him.

Swain is still pick or ban in high elo, even if people "know how to counter him" it doesn't stop them from forcing the other team to play differently and if they slip up a tiny bit they get immediately stomped tanky bird monster for the rest of the game.

What you have to remember is that riot don't do things in the current patch most times, and that is why most things that are OP don't take any nerfs for at least 2 patches (the second one is the one that they are making currently, so in other words 6.13 is basically set in stone, 6.14 is the patch they are making at rito HQ)

Is he really that op?

I mean I have been against Swain 2-3x using my champ which is countered by Swain and I won all.

Well he has almost 60% win rate, so he is winning more games than everyone else.

Plus i saw him 1v2 a Mundo and Braum with no problem at all, in fact i think Mundo had to flash just to live.
What was his build and buffs?

Sorry Mundo and Singed (for some reason i had braum in my head)

and swain's build was this at the end of the game (i cant remember what he had during the fight, but he definitely didnt have rylais or GA)

{{item:3030}} {{item:3157}} {{item:3116}} {{item:3065}} {{item:3009}} {{item:3026}} 

he had no buffs that i can recall (except maybe a dragon or two)

Quite honestly, I'm not surprised that the Swain was able to 2v1 them, especially with that build. It gives his ult a huge amount of damage and slow effect, but also increases the self heal immensely.

I'm actually surprised he took {{item:3030}} when {{item:3146}} is potentially a better item for him.

remember that this is mundo we are talking about as well

and no champion should be able to reliably 2v1 no matter what they build

Mundo isn't as tanky as people believe he is. He burns through a lot of health to attack or escape and there currently isn't any item that can combat magic pen. runes and masteries.

Swain has a lot of consistant damage in every ability that can all be activated at once and tear through an opponent, and Mundo has no real hard CC. If there was a snare or a silence, I'm sure that both Singed and Dr. Mundo would of been fine. 

But since the only CC available was a fling and 2 mediocre slows, Swain is left to walk all over them.


If in the future you are or do suspect you are against a Swain, go for some hard CC, like a bind, silence or stun.
